info.description: Documentation for the API for the chemical transformation database

parameters.name: New Transformation Record
parameters.description: The record to post

predecessor_dsstox_id.description: The DSSTox ID of the predecessor chemical

predecessor_name.description: The name of the predecessor chemical

predecessor_smiles.description: The SMILES of the predecessor chemical

successor_dsstox_id.description: The DSSTox ID of the successor chemical

successor_name.description: The name of the successor chemical

successor_smiles.description: The SMILES of the successor chemical

pH.description: The pH at which the reaction occured

pH_min.description: Minimum of the pH at which the reaction occured

pH_max.description: Maximum of the pH at which the reaction occured

rate_min.description: Rate constant minimum value in a range

rate_max.description: Rate constant maximum value in a range

activation_kcal_per_mol.description: Activation energy in kilocalories per mole

temp_C.description: Temperature at which the reaction occured in degrees Celsius

year.description: The year the citation was published

month.description: The month the citation was published

day.description: The day the citation was published
